languages.text: "Кучка серфов из обслуги одного из приглашенных на церемонию дворян. Причастных уже допрашивают". {n}Вистенца поджимает губы.{/n} "Они не смогли бы устроить все это без помощи изнутри поместья... впрочем, это лишь исполнители. Что касается организаторов, то, боюсь, в усадьбе мы их не найдем".

traits.locale_text: "Кучка серфов из обслуги и свиты одного из приглашенных на церемонию дворян. Его уже допрашивают". {n}Вистенца поджимает губы.{/n} "Они не могли бы организовать все это без помощи изнутри поместья... впрочем, это лишь исполнители. Что касается организаторов, то, боюсь, в усадьбе мы их не найдем".

languages.text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."
languages.original_text: "Кучка серфов из обслуги одного из приглашенных на церемонию дворян. Причастных уже допрашивают". {n}Вистенца поджимает губы.{/n} "Они не смогли бы устроить все это без помощи изнутри поместья... впрочем, это лишь исполнители. Что касается организаторов, то, боюсь, в усадьбе мы их не найдем".

All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

languages.text: “是一群农奴，来自受邀参加仪式的某个贵族家族。就在我们谈话的这段时间，所有参与者都在接受审讯。”{n}维丝坦萨抿了抿嘴唇。{/n}“如果庄园里没有内应的话，他们恐怕不可能把事情安排到这种地步……也就是说，那些人仅仅是在执行命令。至于真正的幕后黑手，恐怕从他们之中是找不到的。”
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: “是一群农奴，来自受邀参加仪式的某个贵族家族。就在我们谈话的这段时间，所有参与者都在接受审讯。”{n}维丝坦萨抿了抿嘴唇。{/n}“如果庄园里没有内应的话，他们恐怕不可能把事情安排到这种地步……也就是说，那些人仅仅是在执行命令。至于真正的幕后黑手，恐怕从他们之中是找不到的。”

languages.text: «Un grupo de sirvientes de la casa de uno de los nobles invitados a la ceremonia. Estamos interrogando a todos los involucrados ahora mismo». {n}Vistenza aprieta los labios.{/n} «No podrían haber organizado todo esto sin ayuda desde dentro de la finca... lo que significa que solo cumplen órdenes. En cuanto a los verdaderos responsables, me temo que no se encuentran aquí».
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: «Un grupo de sirvientes de la casa de uno de los nobles invitados a la ceremonia. Estamos interrogando a todos los involucrados ahora mismo». {n}Vistenza aprieta los labios.{/n} «No podrían haber organizado todo esto sin ayuda desde dentro de la finca... lo que significa que solo cumplen órdenes. En cuanto a los verdaderos responsables, me temo que no se encuentran aquí».

languages.text: 「式典に招待した貴族のひとつが所有する農奴の一味です。ちょうど関係者全員に尋問しているところです」{n}ヴィステンツァは唇をキッと結ぶ。{/n}「屋敷内部の者が手引きしなければ、奴らはこうした準備もできないはず…つまり、命令を実行したにすぎないということです。本件の真犯人は、残念ですがこの場にはいないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: 「式典に招待した貴族のひとつが所有する農奴の一味です。ちょうど関係者全員に尋問しているところです」{n}ヴィステンツァは唇をキッと結ぶ。{/n}「屋敷内部の者が手引きしなければ、奴らはこうした準備もできないはず…つまり、命令を実行したにすぎないということです。本件の真犯人は、残念ですがこの場にはいないでしょう」

languages.text: "Eine Bande Leibeigener aus dem Haushalt eines der Adligen, die zu der Zeremonie eingeladen waren. Alle Beteiligten werden in diesem Augenblick verhört." {n}Vistenza schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Sie hätten das alles niemals ohne Hilfe aus dem Anwesen vorbereiten können ... will sagen, sie haben lediglich Befehle befolgt. Was die wahren Schuldigen angeht, fürchte ich, dass wir sie nicht auf dem Gelände finden werden."
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Bande Leibeigener aus dem Haushalt eines der Adligen, die zu der Zeremonie eingeladen waren. Alle Beteiligten werden in diesem Augenblick verhört." {n}Vistenza schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Sie hätten das alles niemals ohne Hilfe aus dem Anwesen vorbereiten können ... will sagen, sie haben lediglich Befehle befolgt. Was die wahren Schuldigen angeht, fürchte ich, dass wir sie nicht auf dem Gelände finden werden."

languages.text: « Une bande de serfs qui travaillent pour l'un des nobles invités à la cérémonie. Nous interrogeons tous les individus impliqués en ce moment même. Ils n'auraient pas pu organiser cette attaque sans l'aide d'une personne appartenant à ce domaine, {n}explique Vistenza avec un air pincé,{/n} ce qui signifie qu'ils ne faisaient qu'exécuter des ordres. Quant aux véritables coupables qui tirent les ficelles, j'ai bien peur que nous ne les trouvions pas ici. »
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: « Une bande de serfs qui travaillent pour l'un des nobles invités à la cérémonie. Nous interrogeons tous les individus impliqués en ce moment même. Ils n'auraient pas pu organiser cette attaque sans l'aide d'une personne appartenant à ce domaine, {n}explique Vistenza avec un air pincé,{/n} ce qui signifie qu'ils ne faisaient qu'exécuter des ordres. Quant aux véritables coupables qui tirent les ficelles, j'ai bien peur que nous ne les trouvions pas ici. »

languages.text: "Törene davet edilen soylulardan birinin hane halkından bir grup hizmetkâr. Olaya karışan herkes an itibarıyla sorgulanıyor." {n}Vistenza dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n} "Tüm bunları içeriden yardım almadan planlamış olamazlar. Bu da demektir ki birinin emirlerini yerine getiriyorlar. Elebaşına gelirsek, bugün burada bulunanlar arasında olduğunu sanmam."
languages.original_text: "A gang of serfs from the household of one of the nobles invited to the ceremony. All those involved are being interrogated as we speak." {n}Vistenza purses her lips.{/n} "They could not have arranged all this without help from within the estate... that is to say, they are merely carrying out orders. As for the true culprits behind this, I fear they will not be found on the premises."

traits.locale_text: "Törene davet edilen soylulardan birinin hane halkından bir grup köle. Olaya karışan herkes an itibarıyla sorgulanıyor." {n}Vistenza dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n} "Tüm bunları içeriden yardım almadan planlamış olamazlar. Bu da demektir ki birinin emirlerini yerine getiriyorlar. Çıbanbaşına gelince... Bugün burada bulunanlar arasında olduğunu sanmam."
